entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
